text: Need Riley Evans for David Jones campaign. Budget around $33,808, looking for 2 x Twitter post, 1 x Media interview, 2 x YouTube short, 1 x Lifestyle photography, 1 x Facebook story. 6 week exclusivity from other fashion brands.
